DOC.brief_summary: Patients edentulous mandible restore implant participate core study CR 04/07 recruit extension study . No intervention make extension study clinical follow-up examination questionnaire . Patients receive investigational treatment study . Patients follow 5 10 year date original implant loading
DOC.brief_title: Long-term Study Evaluate Different Dental Implant Alloys Straumann 3.3mm Diameter Bone Level Implants
DOC.detailed_description: The primary study objective compare implant survival Titanium Zirconium ( Roxolid™ ) implant compare Titanium grade IV ( SLActive® ) implant baseline ( surgery ) 10 year . The following outcome parameter evaluate 5 10 year post surgery two different implant type Straumann® Bone Level SLActive , diameter 3.3 mm , Titanium-Zirconium ( Roxolid® ) vs. Straumann® Bone Level SLActive implant , diameter 3.3 mm , Titanium Grade IV : - Implant survival - Implant success accord Buser et al . ( 1990 ) - Crestal bone level change measure Orthopantomogram ( OPT ) - Soft tissue health - Clinical measurement - Prosthetic part assessment : Success maintenance - Oral Health Related Quality Life ( OHRQoL ) - Product Safety ( Adverse event device deficiency )
DOC.criteria: Subjects must voluntarily sign informed consent form Patients must commit participate study ten year followup examination Subjects must receive treatment CR 04/07 core study Subjects must complete 3 year visit core study Physical handicap would interfere ability perform adequate oral hygiene attend follow visit Use investigational drug device study Conditions circumstance , opinion investigator , would prevent completion study participation interfere analysis study result , history noncompliance , unreliability
